content: I'm from the Crypto Networks Baunty Management Community. I want to run a bounty campaign with your project. Let me know if you're interested. I've preached a lot of bounty campaigns before. According to everyone, my medium of promotion is different, but everyone likes it. Also ask me any questions if you want to do more about a bounty campaign.Means Of Bounty :1. Twitter2.Facebook3.Telegram4.Instagram5.Discord6.Medium7.Reddit8.Article9.Signatures9.Tik Tok Video/ Youtube VideoContact Me On Telegram: https://t.me/CN_Community_Manager

comments.body: Tell me you didn't just bumped the topic after 2 minutes of posting it, you can only do that every 24 hours. Lol also wrong board, this goes to services. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0
